register.title: Registration

login.minlength: Your Username is required to be at least 1 character.
login.maxlength: Your Username cannot be longer than 50 characters.
login.pattern: Your Username must contain a number and an lowercase letter

fullName.minlength: Your username is required to be at least 1 character.
fullName.maxlength: Your username cannot be longer than 50 characters.

serialOwner.minlength: This field is required to be at least 1 character.
serialOwner.maxlength: This field cannot be longer than 50 characters.

phoneNumber.minlength: Your phone number is required to be at least 9 character.
phoneNumber.maxlength: Your phone number cannot be longer than 11 characters.
phoneNumber.pattern: Your phone number required numbers from 0 to 9.

contact.minlength: This field is required to be at least 1 character.
contact.maxlength: This field cannot be longer than 50 characters.

serial.minlength: This field is required to be at least 9 character.
serial.maxlength: This field cannot be longer than 12 characters.
